title: 이달의소녀탐구 #424 (LOONA TV #424)
summary:
0:01 -- Choerry demonstrates her new 'Water snake dance'.
0:12 -- HyunJin does the dance. Choerry tells ViVi how HyunJin looks like a water snake. Then the three do it together.
0:27 -- Wild froggo appears. YeoJin borrowed a small hat from the clothes teacher and kept it on one of her 'apples'
0:36 -- YeoJin: "Choerry? Does this hat look good on me?" - Choerry: "Uh..." and proceeds to do the water snake dance.
0:44 -- YeoJin: "What is that? It looks ugly." while refering to the dance. The together upgrade the dance and perform it.
0:51 -- YeoRry are proud of their new dance and end the episode with it.
